column1: Kata Robata////You have to make reservations in advance! Parking lot was full on a Sunday but seating was fast and easy with the rsvp. Our waiter Steven Lo was very friendly and helpful with the menu selection. Â We enjoyed everything we ordered. The texas beef was unfortunately sold out. The whole squid was cooked well
column2: not too chewy and overcooked. The bone marrow was tasty. The best was the Hawaiin amberjack with foie gras; it's unlike anything I've ever tasted! Overall enjoyed our dining experience! Will have to come back for the beef!
